title: League of legend player  since season 1
body:
Hi , i would like to know a few thing about my account. It seems i cant find information on when exactly i started,  the account.  

And i was wondering is their anything a old player like my self could geth , summoner icon . or maybe a free change of name, cause honestly i was young at the time and i would love to change my summoner name. 

i am sory for my english vocabulary, i'm french. 

Dear Riot please consider my demands. i would realy like to know when did i create my account, and if i could be alowed a change of name .

replies.body: We haven't offered any free name changes to my knowledge, and most events are limited as well.  We may change a name in case it's inappropriate, but otherwise name changes can be done in the store for IP or RP.  Thanks for being a long time player, and I hope that helps clear things up!
